heading: Home Page
alt: poster for UN Development goals guide for local councils.
p1: Our Goal as an SAC is to deliver key information on some of the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals; namely Zero Hunger (Goal 2), Clean and Affordable Energy(Goal 7), and Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions(Goal 16).

The United Nations Sustainable Development Goals are the culmination of many years of co-operation between countries and the UN to bring about a more sustainable and bright future by taking actions to improve sustainability.
p2: The 17 sustainability goals, alongside 169 targets collectively form the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development, which was recognised by all UN member states back in 2015.
p3: Some key events leading up to the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development:
